metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3768 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: The Qualcomm performance component in Android before 2016-07-05 on Nexus 5,6, 5X, 6P, and 7 (2013) devices allows attackers to gain privileges via acrafted application, aka Android internal bug 28172137 and Qualcomminternal bug CR1010644.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
